summary: Asset management firms manage trillions of dollars. Minority- and women-owned firms manage very few of these assets. These firms face challenges when competing for investment management opportunities in both the private and federal sectors. We testified about 4 practices that the private sector and government agencies can use to increase opportunities for these firms: Demonstrate commitment by top leaders to increase opportunities Remove barriers that...
title: Investment Management: Key Practices Can Provide More Opportunities for Minority- and Women-Owned Asset Managers
